name: assignee_bot
description: True if the given assignee is identified as a bot.

name: assignee_domain
description: Domain associated to the assignee in SortingHat profile.

name: assignee_gender
description: Assignee gender, based on her name (disabled by default).

name: assignee_multi_org_names
description: List of the assignee organizations from SortingHat profile.

name: author_bot
description: True if the given author is identified as a bot.

name: author_domain
description: Domain associated to the author in SortingHat profile.

name: author_gender
description: Author gender, based on her name (disabled by default).

name: author_multi_org_names
description: List of the author organizations from SortingHat profile.

name: closed_at
description: Date in which the Issue was closed.

name: comment_created_at
description: Date in which comment was created.

name: comment_changed_at
description: Date in which comment was last modified.

name: comment_updated_at
description: Date in which comment was last updated. If not updated it is null.

name: created_at
description: Date in which the Issue was created.

name: is_pagure_issue
description: 1 indicating this is an Issue, used for counting in case other kind of items could be stored in the same index or alias.

name: is_pagure_issue_comment
description: 1 indicating this is a Comment of an Issue.

name: issue_closed_at
description: Date when an Issue was closed.

name: issue_created_at
description: Date when an Issue was opened.

name: issue_pull_requests.id
description: Id of Pull request related to the Issue.

name: issue_pull_requests.title
description: Title of Pull request related to the Issue.

name: issue_updated_at
description: Date when the Issue was updated.

name: metadata__enriched_on
description: Date when the item was enriched.

name: metadata__gelk_backend_name
description: Name of the backend used to enrich information.

name: metadata__gelk_version
description: Version of the backend used to enrich information.

name: metadata__timestamp
description: Date when the item was stored in RAW index.

name: metadata__updated_on
description: Date when the item was updated on its original data source.

name: num_comments
description: Number of comments in the Issue.

name: origin
description: Original URL where the repository was retrieved from.

name: project_1
description: Project (if more than one level is allowed in project hierarchy).

name: related_prs.id
description: Id of Pull request related to the Issue.

name: related_prs.title
description: Title of Pull request related to the Issue.

name: repository_labels
description: Custom repository labels defined by the user.

name: time_to_close_days
description: Time to close Issue in days.

name: time_to_first_attention
description: Time in days from creation to first comment added by an author different from the one who created this Issue.

name: title_analyzed
description: Issue title split by by terms to allow searching.

name: updated_at
description: Date when the Issue was updated.

name: user_bot
description: True if the given user is identified as a bot.

name: user_domain
description: Domain associated to the assignee in SortingHat profile.

name: user_gender
description: Assignee gender, based on her name (disabled by default).

name: user_org_name
description: User's organization name from SortingHat profile.
